column2: My favorite coffee spot in SF.  Carlos and the team run a great operation.  I go there every time I visit the city.  Coffee is high quality and the menu items are special.  Try the bagel w/ lox.  Seating on the sidewalk on Columbus Ave is great for people watching.

I've been to this cafe about 3 times in the past year. I wish I lived closer and would definitely visit more often if I did. This last time, I wasn't sure if they would be open since it was new year's eve, but I still wanted to check, so my boyfriend and I went. They were open on new year's eve! I got my hot chocolate and carrot cake (someone took home the last 2 slices of tiramisu while we were in line.) Really nice spot to go to when alone or with friends or after dinner while on a date. Just make sure to have cash with you.
My husbands favourite coffee place in SF, such a great vibe. Yummy tiramisu and cannoli

This was a perfect spot after a day walking around and exploring the city. Got an affogato, Italian soda and a dessert. It was exactly what we needed. Perfect place to recharge and relax. I’m definitely coming back.

Quite a nice spot for a coffee or tea along with some quick bites. Particularly on a cool evening, it's a perfect respite to warm up and keep your chats going. The selection of drink options is solid though a few more snack and dessert options might be nice.

Stumbled on this spot on our way to the water. Feels like you’ve stepped into Europe. Buzzy atmosphere with a warm neighborhood feel. Breakfast bagel was delicious! Delicious and simple but somehow elevated.
amazing food and service! the inside is very pretty and chill! 10/10 place definitely recommend it!
The coffee is delicious here, one of the best tiramisù’s in my life I found it here
Went there 3 times on our 5 day trip... Either just to enjoy a coffee and dessert or for a delicious breakfast sandwich, staff was so friendly and attentive!
Great breakfast and coffee. Service was fast and friendly.

Fantastic quality from the coffee too the biscotti cookies to the deserts. It's almost as if I was transported to Italy or somewhere else in Europe with the authenticity of the food. I can't wait to come back for more.
Large cafe/brunch joint in the heart of Little Italy. Offers a variety of coffee, drinks and paninis. Fast free wifi, cash only. Their grilled cheese chicken panini was decent, nothing particular.

Great place to grab a hot drink or a sweet treat. We stopped in after seeing The Illusionist show nearby. It was pretty popular and about 80% full inside and out with people at 9pm on a Friday. Mixed crowd if I had to guess. Some older locals with books and chatting it up which was so nice to see. And of course a bunch of tourists wanting a sugar or caffeine fix. (Not a tourist myself in this situation, but I got both!) They care about their drinks offering multiple options for substitutions like soy milk and almond milk for your drinks. Thumbs up from me!

They are not ADA accessible to start. I took my mum who is on a walker here because I always had a great time, but we were shuffled to a side area with the server giving  an attitude. We are then told it would be cash only which is ridiculous. With the North Beach Festival on I suspect the restaurant didn’t want to pay taxes as the event is a cash cow.  A shame that this has left a bad taste in a City that is known for inclusiveness. I will need to have a serious think before I go here again or recommend it to others.
I always enjoyed my hot drinks here and the ice cream was yummy. My favorite is the Hazelnut flavor. Thank you to their attentive staff that kept this place clean and tidy.

the prettiest and coziest café in sf. the servers are all so friendly and nice. amazing coffee machine and the coffee is incredible, literally the best! but you can only pay cash, so bring enough money to try all of the amazing cakes and waffles

Amazing coffee and fabulous cakes and tiramisu that words cant describe. Much better than the place down the street on the corner where the hipsters go. This is where the locals have coffee in the am. Great pastry shop right across the street also. This has been our daily am coffee stop this whole week on our vacation.

We had the falafel plate and the spanakopita. Both were ok but really lacked seasoning - especially garlic. The humus was excellent. The kazandibi also lacked, needed more vanilla. The kunefe was quite good.  Not sure I’d go back.

The hot chocolate here is phenomenal! They also serve it in some of the largest mugs I've ever seen a cafe use, so the price is well worth it. The desserts I've had - tiramisu and the coconut macaroons - are mouthwatering without being too sweet, and, again, you get fairly large portions, which helps justify the somewhat pricey treats. If you're looking for something sweet after a walk around North Beach or a few slices of pizza in Little Italy, I definitely recommend you stop by!

Large coffee menu and plenty of treats in the case. We shared a piece of cheese cake, slice of brasiliana and sacrapatina. All were rich with flavor, great balance and large slices. Today was cash only or we would have added a few more treats to share. Not sure if cash only is the norm.
Great spot for a pasty and coffee, especially in the am for some people watching. Make sure you have cash!

I ended up having breakfast here twice during my stay at at nearby Washington Square hotel. The staff are amazing—friendly, courteous and helpful. The coffee was delicious. And the food was amazing. Highly recommend. They only take cash, so come prepared.

I don’t leave reviews often but I live right around the corner…. Decided to swing by, and was pretty disappointed. Was $6 for mocha. I got it iced with oat milk instead of regular milk. They charged me like $1 extra for ice? It’s frozen water that’s free for them with an ice machine. They also charged extra for the oat milk. Coffee came out to no joke $9 and was maybe 12 oz at best. No chocolate inside either literally tasted like regular coffee.  Just felt like it's really not worth the more premium price.

During my trip to San Francisco, I made two stops into Caffe Greco and would have made more if I had more time. This is the perfect spot to grab coffee, gelato, dessert, whatever you want in an atmosphere you can just sit, relax, and hang out in.  The first visit was in the morning just to grab some coffee. My sister and I grabbed two caffe lattes & my boyfriend ordered the white caffe moca. All were delicious! The white caffe moca is a little sweet for my liking, but the taste of it was certainly enjoyable.  We stopped in again a different night, as they are conveniently open late. We ordered three hot chocolates, a cup of creme brulee gelato, a cup of spumoni gelato, a slice of sacripantina cake & a slice of chocolate kahlua cheesecake. The hot chocolates were tasty. The gelatos were to die for! So creamy and flavorful and a prime highlight for us. The cakes were the only disappointment. We previously had sacripantina from another nearby cafe which set the bar extremely high on our expectations. The kahlua cheesecake was pretty dry and just fell flat for us. Not to fret though, we still loved this place & thoroughly enjoyed everything else.  One tip to note, and honestly, a big disappointment due to the inconvenience is they are a cash-only business so plan accordingly if you're going to stop in.

We have been coming here for years, love the dessert and cafe selection. It's retained it's North Beach vibe and is the perfect spot to people watch, relax or come with family. It's a tradition that I hope to continue for years to come.

I came here in sweats because of a recent assault… I don’t dress up in the city anymore. Was clean and kind and was treated like trash here. Denied a bathroom after purchasing coffee and food and glared at til I left. Decent place if you don’t care how employees treat others that may not look like millionaires. Usually a lot of people reading books here… Otherwise there’s better options.

This place could be insanely good but the traffic it gets brings that potential down a notch. Definitely overpriced and only takes cash. It is a self service place so you're on your own. The cappuccino was ok and the tiramisu was good.  The location is what you pay for. Amazing.

I'm a regular but not really satisfied - music is set and rarely varies.  Coffee is very good, but the food and dessert offerings are just okay and high priced.  Very few power outlets for laptop use and those are not always functional. No heat so in chilly S.F. this place is usually cold (bring your warm gear if you get cold easily).

I came for the Tiramisu, but their deserts looked so good, I decided to try their Sacrapantina and their Brasiliana. Both were really good, although I enjoyed the Brasiliana just a little more. Their coffee with steamed milk was really good too. The only reason I didn't give this place a full five stars is because the ambiance is very dated.

Recommended by friends and came by for the Tiramisu ($25 for 4). It is very creamy (some how like melted ice cream) -- Not sure why it is in such different from other brand but we were to told to put it in refrigerator for couple days to be the best.

I didn’t eat any food here but had to write a review of the white hot chocolate because it was just that good! I had never even heard of it but it was so delicious and a must try in San Francisco. If you want a soda, the Greco Sunrise is also fruity and delicious!
Amazing place. My husband was here 20 years ago and it still the same tasty, friendly and nice.

Lovely neighborhood cafe in North Beach. No fuss no frills, a good hang out place.  Great coffee, pastries, paninis, salads and breakfast dishes. Excellent service and reasonable prices. They have indoor and outdoor seating.
Very nice place nice friendly people variety of deserts ,coffees and more … must try place in North beach I would definitely recommend .thank you
Definitely tasted much better tiramisu cakes before!

Amazing food and great service!! This is just an amazing place to go to at any time! Good breakfasts, good lunches, and good dinners! All in all, if you're near, stop by. It's great for a quick break.
We came for a latte and ended up with their AMAZING home-made ricotta cheesecake!! It was still warm from the oven!! To die for❤❤ We even went back the next day for another slice!!
Best macchiato that I have had in the US. The flavor was amazing and the temperture on point! My husband had the affogato and it was delicious too!
Does remind us of Italy when we visited this place. A tip would be to order a small cup of latte because the large size is too much.
Very cute Cafe located in little Italy. Beautiful details and a friendly service make a visit an experience. The coffee is so good. They offer waffles? Sandwiches and eggs.

This is probably the worst latte I've ever had. It's like drinking flavoured water. Ordered with oat milk, pretty sure they mix water into it perhaps to save on oat milk which is ridiculous when they also charge an extra buck for alternative milks. Stay away from this place if you want to enjoy your coffee!
Caffe Greco's Affogato and Tiramisu are a match made in coffee heaven. Together, they deliver an unforgettable culinary experience that will leave you craving more.
Caffe Greco is a heavenly cafe that serves authentic  espresso drinks and pastries. Their staff is delightful and very welcoming. Caffe Greco is always a treat to sit and enjoy good coffee.
Latte was great but my Brasiliana chocolate cake was too sweet for me.

When you make people stand in line, don’t decide tip for yourself. You can’t keep their due change and force it in your jar!! It’s wrong at every level. Remember it’s about service. Pay your workers and raise the rate if you are short on money.
Unbelievably good. I have found my happy place.
Coffee was excellent and the service was excellent. It's just really pricey. $7.00 for a 16 oz late is a bit much.
Great coffee! Service is kind and fun. We had Greco Grande and Cappuccino + Lemon Cake and Walnut Coffee Cake. Great atmosphere. Nice music. Would recommend. Planning to come back! Enjoy!
Afogato was delicious. Was hoping for tiramisu but they were out. The staff were very friendly. Nice outdoor seating available now.
Frozen in time. Great place to work, grab coffee.. good hot chocolate. Staff is welcoming.!
One of my favourite Italian pub cafes in San Francisco! They have delicious hot chocolate and cakes!
Tiramisu is fantastic, along with a cup of their coffee au lait goes well together here.  Service can be very slow when busy.  Nice atmosphere to soak up.
Cozy, chill atmosphere. Has wifi and bathroom. Ask the people at the front counter for the wifi password.
It's a great little cafe to enjoy North Beach and people watch.
You know it’s gonna be amazing when they take cash only…. Good vibes in the second room for studying, and open late in SF? Instant 5 stars
The location is so stunning. Tables outside very european. I had a pastrami sandwich which was delicious and chocolate, good prices. I enjoyed outside with the sun.

Nice spot for a coffee in North Beach. Tables on the sidewalk are great for people watching, the coffee is strong and well made (Illy brand). Servive was also efficient and friendly. Didnt try any of the food.
Must have the coffee. I got an oat milk cappuccino. The desserts look amazing!
Reliable North Beach cafe.  Has an Italian cafe vibe.  The staff is friendly and welcoming.  Great for people watching, and reading.  Has an array of sweets to offer as well as coffee and sandwiches.

You want to remember your trip to Italy ? A quick trip oversees with no luggage or passport ? Stop by this place, once you do, read this review again. My combo: espresso ( they use high quality fresh Illy beans, homemade chocolate biscotti, and the best for the end … “Sfogliatella” ( puff pastry with lemon filling )

A charming, cozy cafe/restaurant. I went here for dinner with a friend. We got a tasty black bean salad (although I thought it was overdressed it was still yummy) and the hummus avocado sandwich w tomato and sprouts.  The man (owner?) who rang up our order was super friendly and kind.  We ordered a slice of pie and he HOOKED it up with HELLLA whipped cream, it was so sweet (literally and figuratively).  If you want a friendly, sunny, tasty experience check this spot out.  p.s. the prices were decent, for San Francisco anyway. Good music playing, dub/reggae when we went

Crave for Italian coffee and dessert. My white mocha..is very good. Cannoli...and Tiramisu..are one of the best I have ever tasted...very nice service..my wife love afrogato..my friends love their cappuccino
Such a fun and central cafe in little Italy! This location includes authentic Italian coffee. We lucked out with the beautiful weather in February, so it's a great time to people watch.
Nice cafe with a large sidewalk terrace. Good for people watching while eating a panini and drinking a coffee/wine/beer. Reasonably priced for SF. Recommended.

Beautiful atmosphere and amazing staff. They only take cash so get those greens ready. They make an amazing chai latte and hot chocolate for the kiddies! Plays beautiful acoustic music. Would come everyday if I could.
Great atmosphere, good coffee but they only accept cash.

Snarky baristas here are as permanent as fire hydrants; don’t pee on them ;  the owner is a glad hander and back slapper ;  he thinks he is The Godfather whose soundtrack is played repeatedly. Other than this, this is a great place ! Try instead Stella bakery opposite this cafe ; convivial service with attention to detail on making cappuccino.  My favorite patron here sits outdoors and drags deeply on his perfumed cigarette with visible pleasure, his eyes blissed out. I want to smoke what he smokes.
Had a cake and cappuccino greco grande. Both were delicious and at decent price
Two large White Mocha Latte and two Cannolis and small bag of some sort of chocolate tip cookies $40+ only wish the cannolis were larger.

Fast yet cold service, staff were blunt and not very welcoming. Coffee was very average, food was presented well however, egg white was under cooked, generally the food was underwhelming. Atmosphere sitting outside was nice.
Had the eggplant panini, cappuccino, and ricotta cheese cake while sitting outside and people watching.  Delicious and relaxing.
Cash only, but had the selection of Italian sweets and amazing coffee. Would go back just to sit in the sidewalk and people watch.

Hands down the best tiramisu in San Francisco. Light, airy, the espresso flavor is not too strong. The Lady Fingers and mascarpone are soft and fluffy with lots of cocoa powder. Caffe Greco is pretty much open from early morning to midnight. Neighborhood Italian coffee cafe that has been around for decades. Time has stood here in a great way. The place, quality of coffee and desserts have not changed. If you can grab a table outside, grab it. It's like taking a mini-vacation. Great coffee, homemade Italian desserts. Your blood pressure will drop. The people watching here is awesome. Cash only. There is an ATM machine next to the register.

Stopped by to have a coffee and ordered a cappuccino and it was delicious. My wife and I went to Rome a few months back and it was spot on. Definitely recommend for authentic Italian coffee. They do not accept card but they do have an ATM in the caffe!

Caffe Greco is my first stop in San Francisco every time I come to visit. Over the last 10 years that I have been going there, the tiramisu has never disappointed. I always order atleast a couple. This is as local as it gets, and is almost never filled with tourists.  I almost want to keep this place a secret but it’s too good to be kept hidden.

The coffee is good (they use Illy for their espresso and Cafe Trieste for their brewed coffee). The dessert (cakes and ice cream) are just ok, so I would recommend not passing on the dessert. Come if you want to chill and relax sitting outside watching cars and people go by.  Cash only.
I thought it was the most unique café. I had a lovely cappuccino with my family and we shared dark chocolate dipped biscotti and coconut macaroons. Delicious, nostalgic, and perfect.
Old school espresso/bakery/cafe in North Beach.  Highly recommended.  Indoor and street side seating. Busy but worth the wait.

Not that Cafe Grecco isn't inviting enough on its own to warrant a stop, but we had to leave a 5 star review after having one of the most enjoyable mornings on our trip while here. The atmosphere, quality of coffee/food, authentic service, and location/outdoor seating is everything you'd want in a Cafe in San Fran. Whether you're a local or on a trip, this is worth the time to stop and enjoy yourself.

I unfortunately had already eaten so didn't partake of the food or drink but the people I was with seemed happy with everything. They did say everything in SF was much higher in price than other big cities they've visited.

This is a great place to come and hangout with friends or go alone and get some work done. I've done both and both times I've enjoyed my visit. The staff were very friendly and outgoing. The cappuccino foam was heavenly.
Great outdoor sitting area with views of North Beach night live. Affogato and dessert not bad at all.
I love this place. Pastries are better than most one finds in North Beach, IMO.
Italian bar in the Italian district, with a lot of guests. The pastries are good, as well as the coffee. One single espresso is 2.75 usd, but it is very good
It was not fancy coffee shop as I imagined , but the tiramisu and coffee were really great. It is easy to get a seat in  Coffee Greco, and it is CASH ONLY!

Cafe Greco is a unique experience, located in the heart a little Italy. Fabulous coffee great place to sit in people watch. Wonderful safe neighborhood ( disclaimer always safe when I'm there) My kids often did their homework utilizing very fast Wi-Fi. Great neighborhood coffee shop tell me what you think.

I've tried a bunch of cafes in the area over the years and this place is hands down my favorite cafe. Lots of seating. Great for people watching. Coffee and desserts are delicious too. I used to live in the area so whenever I visit I make it destination to sit down, enjoy a cup of Illy and gnosh on gelato.
Friendly service. Noticed wife Japanese and said hello and thank you in Japanese. Great flavor in coffee and fast service. Nice seating near street.
Super nice cappuccino, latte, and torte. I enjoyed the environment, too, including on-trend music.
Loved this cafe. The staff is friendly and welcoming. I just went ga ga over their coffee :) They do not accept credit cards only cash. A must go
Really good gelatos and fun place to come for a dare or just wirh family . Alot of music around

This is a traditional Italian style bar: no trendy or modern design, no frills or long list of "latte piccolo macchiato" nonsense a la Starbucks...  Just plain simple amazing espresso, cappuccino and traditional deserts. Try the cannolo, the tiramisu or a nice affogato. You won't be disappointed.
Great place to stop for coffee and dessert in North Beach.
Food is not good here for the price . Also I found hair in my bagel ...disgusting! One guy at the counter also takes only cash...
Classic coffee shop at North Beach. Pleasant ambiance. Great place for people watching. Friendly staffs. Loved the Braziliana dessert. Relatively affordable overall (won't break the bank 😉).
The coffee was decent. The cafe is cash-only which was a bummer.

A friend of a friend recommended Caffe Greco to me, I tried the croissant sandwich with mozzarella and tomato and it was buttery, flaky and outstanding. This sandwich and Caffe Greco have been seared into my memory and become part of my personal San Francisco experience.
We are in 2023 and the only accept cash… if you don’t have it they have ATM that cost 3 dollars for transaction.
They don't have a terminal to pay, asked only cash It's not possible in 2023 to exist like that
Fave place in North Beach (where so many classic restaurants have closed 😞 ) for espresso and dessert or a glass if wine outside on a sunny day. "Don't forget the Cannoli!" …
Worst Tiramisu i have ever had. It was watery with no coffee taste whatsoever. Felt like they used whipped cream instead of marscapone. How incredibly disappointing!
Had the gelato sundae, two vanilla lattes and a slice of tiramisu. Great sundae. Decent lattes. Ok Tiramisu. Great atmosphere and open late. Great after a slice at golden boy around the corner.
Always fun coming in here and having a coffee. The workers here are always so sweet!
I ate an omelet, was very tasty. Decent prices and very good service
Nice cozy atmosphere and excellent quality coffee
Cash only :( Otherwise the ricotta was delicious and the coffee was decent too.
Great cappuccino, mild, creamy and toasty. Beautiful day for a hot cappuccino.
Best Latte iced and hot. Get it in house with real cups. Sandwiches are amazing also!!

before moving, my dad raved about the best gelato he ever had… chocolate gelato from cafe greco in SF. safe to say yes, it is one of the best. she is sweet and very much traditional chocolate gelato. make sure to have cash on you as they are cash only
Incredible chai tea!!! Incredible creme brulee gelato! Beyond 5-stars!!
Their hot chocolate ♥️ And perfect if you wana spend a summer noon while reading a book. And the interiors are super vintage. Be sure to have some cash on hand. Cards don’t usually work.

We had to lined up in the evening, when we got to the cashier found they did not accept visa or debit, just cash. There was no notice to find out the rulls and avoid waiting for a long time in the line. I think it was overrated cafe. The quality of the pastries was ok,not so good.
Amazing coffee, even better desserts!
Good coffee! They only accept cash.
Very delicious coffee & desserts .. friendly staff ... Remember to bring Cash with you to be able to order ... Little Italy
I think this cafe is a nice place. I really enjoyed the cheesecake and cannoli.The thing that concerned me was the bathroom it doesn't even lock but other than I think it is a nice cafe.
Excellent coffee, decent ambient, but * cash only * which is a deal breaker.

Amazing friendly and hard working staff, the decor reminds me of old cafes in Italy. It's a great spot for working or meeting as it's generally not busy/noisy. I wish the pastries, coffees and food were up to Italian standards of quality. They are ok but not great.

Caffè Greco is my favorite place for a cappuccino in Little Italy. The baristos are hilarious and friendly, speaking to me in Spanish and Italian and making a killer cappuccino. There are tons of great places for coffee in the area, but I always go to Greco for the environment on top of the  caffè buonissimo.
Great coffee, good people, good vibes.They've got more than your typical selection of coffee.
Delicious tiramisu that beats away afternoon fatigue. Beverages were also good, speedy and friendly staff and nice cozy atmosphere.

Couldn't believe the absolute lack of service and respect. Asked for the receipt which he reluctantly gave, than noticed they wanted to charge $7:00 for a medium coffee. Asked the server why they didn't have the prices? They guy got angry and returned our money and asked us to leave! Incredible! If you want a tourist trap an want to be screwed. Stay. If you want the same thing at 1/3 the price go across  the street to Stella Pastry, and you can pay with your credit card. Easy!
Good spot in the middle of North Beach. Cash only, FYI

This is a must go coffee shop that anyone should visit. This old coffee shop make you travel in time with their unique and old style. I orderd an americano which was dark and strong as I like and my party ordered hot chocolate that they enjoyed. we ordered cannolis with our drinks and in my case it gave me a little of sweetness that went well with my bitter dark coffee.  The place is nice and clean and also you can enjoyed the outdoor tables to contemplate people passing around with their dogs.
The worst coffee of my life. I don't know what it was, but I had ordered a Latte😐 …

Went this morning to this institution caffe I knew years ago for a quick breakfast: ordered 2 eggs and ham over muffins and a almond croissant. Eggs where over cooked and muffin where hiding over a old piece of cheese. My croissant was maybe 2/3 days old and hard to chew on! Anyhow this place is going downhill
Walked in to order food. They told me no more food, when the sign out say’s Served all Day
After trying nearly all the Canolli in North Beach, I do declare Greco is #1

The last time I was there, the employee picked up my pastry with his dirty bare hands.  Some of the staff could learn to be friendlier as well. The decor and ambience of the place are nice, but just make sure to watch when they go to serve you.

CASH ONLY. But besides that, amazing food and coffee in this cute artisan coffee shop. Lots of ample seating inside and outside. Try the Salmon bagel and cappuccino! Lovely staff, and locals and regulars were treated like family. Great place to go!
Definitely one of the North Beach’s staple..
Delicious tiramisu and great coffee that comes with friendly service.
They can't make a proper cappuccino which is so basic. Way too hot to drink+ bitter taste+ won't make a breve+ no foam. Very disappointing.
Coffee was great. Panini had to be abandoned because they only take cash!
Such a charming cafe! Tuck away in the city, and be immediately transported to Italy. Great food. Great vibe. Bring a book and just be.

Great coffee. Great location right on Columbus. I've been going there for 20 years and the place retains its charm. Sitting outside definitely brings back memories of old Europe. Between the great coffee, excellent cakes, people watching, historic buildings across the street and outside air, the place has the whole package. The staff was very friendly and attentive to boot. I believe it's still cash only.
The Cannili n café latte was fabulous n delicious! I love North Beach at night. Viva Italy 🇮🇹 n Mona Lisa 🧡 …
My cappuccino and my son's cake were good. My friend's wife's chai latte is more latte, less chai. The batista was very helpful though.
Very yummy cheesecake. I liked the music playing in the cafe. I saw people working on their laptops also.

This place is cash only. Beware of frozen tiramisu. I was so excited to try their desserts, but their tiramisu had frozen ladyfingers layers with pieces of ice, and cream was basically tasteless. Frozen biscuits and melted cream do not make a good combination neither in texture, nor in taste.

Just started coming here earlier this year because my favorite cafe closes a lot earlier than Cafe Greco does. The staff are very friendly and most days welcome you with a smile. I come here because they're one of the few cafes that serve the best cakes in North Beach! I love their Brasiliana and the Tiramisu is great too! The coffee is not as strong as I like but it's okay, especially with their cakes!
Casual and small. A nice place to relax and have a quick snack
The food was very good and there were many choices that were yummy
Simply one of the best double espresso in San Francisco.
There is no way to call it America !!!!! While sitting here you feel full enjoinment with very and very delicious food !!! IMPRESSED !
Really good breakfast in San Francisco
Very friendly and cozy. Food was great too!

This is a nice Italian cafe in North Beach. Spacious seating area with free WiFi and outlets. I had the latte and shared a cannoli with my girlfriend. Everything was delicious. Italian music and oldies are serenading the patrons at this shop. Friendly staff. Cash only. Nice ambience in this place and great place to spend some time on a lazy Sunday.
Great coffee, good people, good vibes.They’ve got more than your typical selection of coffee.
Great coffee but the best chocolate tartufo i ever had!. Pls keep in mind they only take cash. However there is an atm
Had a late night coffee and dessert here! Loved the atmosphere. Heads-up, it's cash only!
CASH ONLY: Good food and really cute outdoor seating. Real reason to come is for the coffee though, good variety and well brewed.

Italian cafe with drinks, salads, coffee and more in the bustling centrer of North Beach. Be prepared to self serve by ordering inside/taking outside to your table. Lots of folks walking by for a quasi- see & be- seen atmosphere.
Nice spot to sit down for a coffee or snack in North Beach. They had good nougat though a bit overpriced.

Great place to enjoy a coffee outdoors. Snacks are delicious  It's a nice place to relax and do some people watching. No one hurries you which is great. It's a good meeting place. Price is not above the average in the neighborhood.
Good if you're Greek.
Tiramisu is delicious! Friendly staff
Always superb coffee and yummy Tiramisu
The Tiramisu was alright, a bit on the soggy side. The affogato was nice. Great place to hang out with friends.
Great atmosphere.  Friendly staff and excellent blackberry Cabernet gelato!
Nice n cozy place with amazing selection of pastries,  Gelato, beverages and italian desserts.
The best cannolis I've ever had and the cappuccino was amazing....

Stopped by for dessert on a weeknight. We had the ricotta cheesecake and a cannoli. They were both very good. The coffee was OK, not great. Steamed milk for the latte was not quite hot enough. Flavors were well balanced, textures were good. The cannoli is filled when you order it. This is an excellent way to do it since the shell gets soggy if it sits with the filling in it. Nice touch. Overall, this is great little spot for dessert in North Beach.

I'm a little bewildered that I've been coming here for over a quarter-century and somehow have never left a review; mind blown.  Caffe Greco is a North Beach institution, and one of the reasons that I wanted to live in this San Francisco neighborhood. It exudes the same vibe I recall from spending time in countless neighborhood cafés around Italy, from Cortina to many Roman piazzas.  The pastries and cakes are varied; all I've tasted have been satisfying.  Their coffee drinks — usually a macchiato or cappuccino for me — have always been a delight; my "madeline" if you will. In these pandemic times they're served in a paper cup rather than the heavyweight ceramic of better days, but this too shall pass.  I'll be heading back to North Beach shortly, and Caffe Greco will get another visit. Friendly and helpful staff just drives home the deal.
Fantastic panini and coffee! Owners are very friendly also. Great outdoor seat area.

My run too when all the Cafe's have closed down in North Beach District. I like their hot chocolate and chocolate cake, but there mochoas are good too...  Nice front patio and parking let for hanging out and having a smooth cup of jaw dropping coffee...

Cash only. Scrumptious paninis. The staff are very fast. I was here on a busy day, and my fabric was ready in less than two minutes. It came with a nice side salad. Decent selection of beer and wine fir such a small place. They have outdoor seating available and a whole other room with more tables through a door by the main entrance.

Very nice staff but watch out, its cash only-amazing tiramisu and a nice place to work, extra seating in the room next door. Have breakfast+lunch food, outside seating, cakes and some alcoholic options.
Note quite a replacement for our beloved Cafe Puccini which burned down, but very good.
While strolling North Beach, this spot can’t be missed
Great place to enjoy coffee and dessert.   A bit pricey,  but not exorbitantly so.

The only good thing about this place is the brand of coffee they use for their drinks. The atmosphere is that of an old coffee shop that's unmaintained and dirty. The baristas are disorganized and take too long to fix drinks, there are no napkins around, no individual sugar packets but sugar in bulk that you spoon in your coffee with the same spoon as every customer, and a few spoons that are used and thrown in a container with water that everyone uses - very unsanitary. Desserts are not fresh and they taste like cardboard. Not a good experience.

In an area full of authenticity this place stood out as being functional (I am a fan of Illy coffee but it's everywhere in SF) but highly unauthentic, especially with a waiter who didn't know what a cannolo was.  The place itself was pleasant but if you want as genuine experience as you can get I'd suggest picking somewhere else.

This place serves some great Italian desserts and espressos, and it's busy throughout the day. The staff is very polite. Some have said that it's a good place for studying or working, though I contend that it's too noisy and bustling for that. Instead, sit outdoors or by the window to watch the passerby, while you savor your espresso, your tiramisu, and the presence of your companions.

Really enjoyed their late night atmosphere. We sat down for their cafe latte and a piece of tiramisu, which were both really food. There was line that moved pretty slow but the service was friendly. The price is standard for the neighborhood and seating was easy to get.
Always LOVE Caffe Greco! One of our top 3 espresso caffes in North Beach. I'm wheat flour allergic and the great staff helps direct me to what I can eat!!

I love coming here on Sunday mornings before going to the St. Francis of Assisi church across the street.  They have patio seating on the sunny side of the street so you can enjoy the warmth while people watching.  My go-to breakfast is their granola with yogurt and fruit and a medium cappuccino.  The granola is tasty and crunchy and they top that with creamy yogurt and sliced strawberries and bananas.  YUM!  I've also had their croissants and tiramisu - both were delicious.  The waiters are always so nice and helpful.  Great service.  Cash only.

My favorite coffee shop in San Francisco. It is my second favorite coffee in SF. It is a shop that offers plenty of seating inside and some outside patio too. Their coffee is delicious and you have to try their desserts.  Added bonus because they offer a non-dairy milk for those who are lactose-intolerant.
Great spot for breakfast or a late night tiramisu. Good quality food and friendly service.
Wonderfully authentic espresso spot. Got a quick, quality espresso and a small covered table outside to enjoy it on the sidewalk and people watch. Great spot.
Absolutely delicious cappuccino and caffè latte

Wonderful  breakfast and coffee choices.  The pastry choices were good too.  Good prices for our family of five.  The staff was friendly and the service was great.  I would definitely come here again.
Great place, good portions. Remember to bring cash to pay there.
Great local spot!  Had a delicious hot chocolate & some panforte.

Cash only cash only cash only! This is one of the few original coffee shops in North Beach. Good quality coffee and pasteries, excellent European style cafe with plenty of seating. Reasonably quiet as well, did not have to yell my order, like we did at cafe triest.
Nice location, coffee is ok. Nothin special
Very delicious& Rich in taste🥰 …

My favorite café is the entire world so far. I have been coming here for over fifteen years and every visit is just as good as the first. Perfectly prepared cappuccino, espresso, and coffees. Paired with Italian desserts and treats, with WIFI and outdoor al-fresco seating. Excellent for conversation and people watching. Prices are worth every penny. Highly recommended.
I love Cafe Greco. This was an old school meeting spot for when some  friends showed up from out of town. Hasn't really change one bit. Love the coffee and sandwich's are on poin💯❤ …
Caffe ' Greco it's like a very strong warrior. It gets better and better with time. Great place for a magnificent espresso. Brings back wonderful memories. 😉 …
I was here 4 months ago and had an excellent cup of coffee and house made tiramasu. It a very nice place to stop on my rest day when I was bikepacking the west coast!

Greco has probably been around for longer than you’ve been alive. They have consistently good pastries and good coffee available all day and a good bit into the night, but unfortunately that has made them into a bit of a north beach staple. Expect a crowd. If you manage to find a time in which there isn’t one, take advantage of it.
What a Cafe! Fun staff, and the best egg and cheese on a croissant I've ever had!
Nice cozy cafe with amazing desserts
Friendly staff, decent setting. Ok coffee if you like dark roasts.
Nice and cozy place on columbus ave. Seating arrangement was good. Staff was super nice and quality of food was amazing. We ordered egg and cheese sandwich with crossaint. Cappuccino was well made.

Lots of seating for a cafe and has wifi. Also has outside seating which is great to  people watch in North Beach. Decent tiramisu...light airy, not too sweet or cakey but could use more rum and espresso in the ladyfingers. But it could have been because I got the corner piece which may not have gotten all the soaky goodness.
They only accept cash but expensive I feel but it is good.

great portions, good coffee. the best part is the people watching!! they have these floor to ceiling windows, and columbus is just a very popular street. they've also extended the outside seating, so you can be indoors or out. love coming here with friends or by myself.
Good ambience. I enjoyed the cider Abe cake. … they hide their WIFI info, and the customer service is ok at best.

Decent coffee house with ample space &  seating in two rooms. Enjoyed their lattes & mochas-which are served in nice tall glasses. They carry a variety of italian pastries & cakes such cannoli, tiramisu, & sacripantina. Also, they sell Illy ground coffee in their signature cans. Overall a good spot to have a cup of coffee after dinner. Cash only!
AUTHENTIC Italian coffee house with baked good and gelato. Only accepts case but great place to sit in Little Italy. Recommended.
I had a biscotti and an espresso. Awesome. Great service.
Service was fast and members were nice. Coffee was just ok, a little on the pricey side but what can you expect from SF, right? P.S.: they only take cash.
Salad had more flavor than my Chicken Zucchini Panini. Also, bummer they don't have waiters, U have to get up and go inside to counter each time you want something...

Easily the worst coffee I've tasted in years. Asked for decaf but it hit me exactly the way I didn't want to leaving awful aftertaste. Even cream was weak. They didn't have half-n-half, just milk and it was pretty diluted. Not coming back

Best coffee in the city! My Father who was a cop in SF for over 30 years and his buddies would go here everyday for coffee on their beat. Been going here since I was a little kid. Great service, great atmosphere and delicous coffee.  My personal reccomendation is the Greco Grande *
This cafe is located in little Italy. The decor was inviting. Customer service was friendly. Their cuppicino was superb. My friends sat in the side walk patio and  enjoyed the cool weather.
Best café latte ever!
Good coffee. Great experience cruising the North Beach neighborhood. We enjoyed a traditional Italian dessert I can't find any where else. People watching is great here
Tiramisu was too soggy :(
Only accept cash. Very bad.
Charming looks but cappuccino was watery and tasteless and candle filling tasted like whipped cream. Lemon cake was good.
Good Illy coffee, beer, wine, great atmosphere.  Always busy when I get here sundayS arroua 6:00, but always a seat.  Pastries are not the best.  I wish they would find a better bakery.
Always a great experience, coffee, service
We were greeted by a very friendly man who made the best cappuccino. The food was delicious and the almond pastry was excellent!
no longer quite the place where San Francisco gathers, but still a spot where you can have a coffee and talk with a friend not a laptop ghetto.

Our capuccino was burnt, which was pretty disappointing considering that's why we came. My husband was a barista and said it tasted like the beans were ground too course. The chocolate cake was great.
Cozy and authentic. Made great sandwiches and espresso that reminded me of Europe.  Lots of locals were there and plenty of tables to sit and unwind for a little while.  Nice staff and on-par prices.
Had a delicious hot chocolate here.

The frothy cafe au lait transported my friend back to Paris! The sfogliatelle filled authentically with slightly sweet, orange-flavored ricotta made me want to order another.  With plenty of seating indoors and out, we enjoyed a relaxing Sunday morning breakfast. Quick, friendly service. Delicious food.  If only I lived here, I would be back to try their gelato and tantalizing desserts.

DO NOT GO HERE FOR PASTRIES.  Go to Mara's (it is a few blocks away) if you want a Italian Pastry.   The coffee here was good, but that is hard to mess up.  We had the Canoli's from Greco and they were absolute dog crap.  You can tell the person who made them had no idea what a real Canoli tastes like.

Great gelato. Wanted to try coffee, but didn't realize it was cash only- there was a sign near the register with the WiFi, and after we were told cash only, I looked back a moment later, and it had been turned around to announce cash only. Would have been nice to know before going in.
An Italian style coffee bar of superb quality. Great choice of coffees and pastry at reasonable prices. Nice staff. Definetely a recommendation in North Beach.
Great coffee, excellent pastries and a wonderfully friendly staff! Oh and a nice cafe setting.
Nice food and coffee. Expensive but tasty

Caffe Grecco is a great place for a good cup of coffee and they also have very good hot chocolate. The variety of pastries is very low but they do have so good desserts. The service is very good and I would definetly reccomend going to it after dinner for a nice sweet treat.

I just don't understand "cash only" places this day in age....really inconvenient and if someone in our party wouldn't have had enough cash for all of us than we would have had to go somewhere else. Decent breakfast, coffee and mimosas though.
Great place to enjoy a cup of coffee with delicious food. I had pouched eggs with salmon  suggested by Juan the cashier and it was divine. Definitely coming back!

This spacious caffe in the heart of Little Italy has an ambience that makes you dream of the mediterranean sea, warm spring days and just good coffee. The experience is complemented by good wifi and lovely music. Would totally come back here for work (tables may be a bit too small for 2 laptops tho) or to just relax with a friend.
Ordered tiramisu and coffee and the tiramisu was top notch, all flavors balanced and similar to the one I had in Florence :)

*Cash Only* Still my fave place to crash and plow through an inbox or catch up on reading. Lots of tables for heads down work and Illy espresso drinks in addition to a nice gelato and pastry selection. Don't don't miss the home made tiramisu!  For nice days, take your coffee out to the sidewalk seating and take in the North Beach vibe. Or, if you've already satiated your inner bookworm from a purchase from legendary City Lights Books down the street, no better way to page through your new literary acquisition than over a warm mocha at one of Greco's tables.
I got the chai latte, and it was incredible. The creamy texture and light flavor were perfect to distract from my date that was tanking at the time. I'll be back again to try the tiramisu.

Loved this place back when $9 pasta was a luxury, and still love it for nostalgia's sake. If you're looking for fine dining or in town for just a few days, go elsewhere, but locals should all give Greco a try.

This is a "Must visit". Great coffee and friendly staff. It's almost like I stopped to visit with friends and family. I will return every time I'm in town. And that tiramisu was simply out of this world!
Great coffee.  Took home a bag of homemade macaroons, but they were dry.  Super nice staff and owner.

First of all, cash only, so be sure to have it. Great cafe for drinks, we got a cappuccino, a blackberry cabarnet gelato which was amazing along with a Braziliana which is chocolate cake soaked in expresso with cream which was great. Great atmosphere as well as a friendly staff.

What a great little piece of Europe. Loved everything from the ambience to the mind-boggling array of options.  The price is pretty decent too, considering the neighborhood and how upscale this cafe is. A break from America for a bit!

Espresso (Illy), which I almost always drink black, was up to snuff. However, the volume of the double shot was perhaps a bit excessive. Service at the counter could be improved, as a customer ordering directly from the barista I didn't feel very welcome.
Great Cafe Mocha, the best teramasu I've had. Ham and cheese crucent good.
Lots of seating and decent tea and coffee. Be sure to browse the dessert case! Seating is available outdoors too, even on rainy days as they have a canopy above the sidewalks!
Perfect coffee, perfect croque madame (they refer to it as poached egg panini). Best place to eat a yummy breakfast without making a fuss.  The place is really casual and cash only

Best thing here is their latte. The tiramisu is amazing as well. Just to cap it all off, the gelato was amazing. Plaenty of plug points for you to work on your laptop. My favorite cafe in North Beach.
Cafe Greco is a great local place  for a cup of coffee. However, it does not offer very many pastries. The decor is good though, as it offers great inside and outside seating with a view.
Old school cash only charm with rare late hours for SF let down by subpar espresso and dated dining

I cannot visit San Francisco without stopping by Caffe Greco for some coffee and dessert. If possible, I'd park myself in a seat there and stay the entire day, working my way through the dessert menu and drinking cup after cup of excellent coffee.
Delicious coffee, and yummy pastry treats. Cash only, prices are fairly reasonable. My favorite cafe in Little Italy!
Go for the tiramisu and cannelloni! Just go... you'll love it! Oh...and don't forget a latte, too. Wonderful atmosphere makes you feel like you're back in old San Francisco.
The probably best chocolate cake I ever had. When you go there make sure to have a slice. Its also a relaxed atmosphere.
Been going there since late 80s. Love that I see the same crew for many years now. Love Caffe Greco. Going business picks up during these troubling times.

Either in the afternoon or an after dinner caffe Greco is really good for coffee/dessert while watching people pass by. Usually packed with angry older Italian men arguing over something (in a cute Italian way), tourists and couples. Sit outside for if you like people watching.  The coffee is good. Get the affogato and forget about the calories for a moment. The desserts are also good here, Tiramisu and cannoli are great.  One of my go to cafes in Little Italy.
Enjoyed some delicious gelato and a cookie at the cafe seating out front on Columbus
Wonderful cakes and coffee flavors. Brought overseas friend and we both enjoyed the outside sitting and the great coffee. Remember, CASH ONLY
Great spot to go after lunch/dinner for desserts, coffee, or tea.  Plenty of seating indoors as well as small tables with chairs outside on the walkway.
Consistently tasty desserts and pleasantly pungent, strong coffee and coffee drinks.  Tables are kinda wobbly and it's neither a wonderfully comfortable nor intimate place, but it's got character.
I only had an espresso machiatto but it was well done with just enough foam and a tiny, tiny hint of milk to round it up. The staff were helpful too.
Beautiful Outside seating is quaint and perfect for hearing and seeing the sounds of San Fran. Food was well prepared. Salmon was delicious. Thank you
Great place with nice sitting area, but I came out a little disappointed with the Braziliana dessert: the cake part was dry, and even though creme was great, it was still FROZEN. :/
Wonderful little cafe with delicious espresso / cappuccino. Excellent service and a great selection of traditional and delicious Italian deserts (Tiramisu, Cannoli, Biscotti, etc...)

***Try the Chocolate Bannana Bread Pudding*** & you'll become an Addict & get arrested :-) They only make 2 pans a day of it & when its gone its gone. Even saying you're the new Mayor (who is it?) won't get you a piece when its gone. Good sammies & great deserts.
Amazing. But bring cash!

Obviously the closest official coffee shop you’ll get to Firenza, IT. Get a large cappuccino, not a small, you’ll thank me later bro/bra.  Only downer is CASH ONLY... it’s ok guys I’ll pay your taxes for the IRS because your coffee is so good!
Amazing gelato, I recommend the mint chip. The espresso is also really good. Definitely come here if you're looking for desert in the area.
Good Coffee, Only downside is that its cash only, but come on, its a mom and pop shop, so what would you expect? Expect coming here for Great Coffee! Bring cash though
Great place with Illy brand coffee and some of the best desserts in the city. Gelato, cannoli, tiramisu, cheesecake, ect.  Nice seating outside as well. Ciao.
Excellent sidewalk cafe for Italian pastries and coffee. Lately I’ve been drinking a double mocha.

Bad biscotti (stale?). We didn't know there could even be bad biscotti. Large, watery espresso shot in the latte made it dilute and watery (to be able to use less milk?).  If you go here, do it for the atmosphere.
Perfect for a breakfast ! Large choice of hot beverages and the pastries were freshly made and delicious
Classic North Beach Cafe experience.... the best coffee
Best cappuccino in the city. Nice outdoor and indoor seating. They speak Italian and Spanish here. Cash only.
Nice place. Food is tasty. Only cash but there's an ATM close to the caffe.
Seriously love this place. If u don’t consider coming here then u just missed the best Italian cafe there is in all of SF.
Excellent cappuccino and great fast service. The pastries look outstanding - I'm sad I'm to full to try any. Next time for sure
Best cannolis ever! Everytime we come to San Francisco, we stop by this place and have never been let down. It's like a bit of heaven. One note...
Amazing coffee. Great sweets!
A real Italian-style coffee, the staff is super friendly and I warmly recommend a Greco Grande cappuccino and their Prosciutto-Caper-Tomatoes Croissant.

Owners are really nice  owners are really nice  Thanks ever body their taking care of my girlfriend the first time their.They mess up my girlfriends order they made it  right.i will be back again again thanks.you guys are the best coffe shop in north beach.😀😀😀😀😀😅😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀. …
Cappuccino and breakfast panini excellent, service fast, staff friendly and cheerful. A nice place to hang out with friends or get some work done.
Cash only.  Couldn't buy what I wanted. Very expensive.  Crowded, limited outdoor seating.
The place for me was average... the waiter confused my husband's order even though we repeated it twice and the Gelato was more a regular ice cream.
Humble and not fancy. Hard working and polite servers. Great coffee and the Tiramisu is the best.
The best place for tiramsu and caffe latte.  No other place does it better than this place. The tiramus is very fresh and ready to eat.  Try it and you'll always come back for more.
Easy spot for tea/coffee. Cannoli was fresh and crunchy; several gelato options, other dessert selection is limited.
Have a macaroon. They are fantastic.
I love coming here for the great coffee but avoid the Croissant
For the past 10 years Caffe Greco has offered the best affogatos and mocha's. Always consistently good.
This Italian coffee place may be the best coffee in North Beach, and perhaps the best in San Francisco. Enough said. The place is CASH ONLY.
Good coffee, good desserts, good ambiance. Cash only.  We love it.
Some dude peed in my coffee
This is a fab cafe. Busy but great coffee and the food was really yum. It had such a lovely vibe that I stayed for ages.
Excellent atmosphere, the outside seating is reminiscent of cafes in Europe. Great place to grab a coffee and snack in Little Italy.
After eating across the street at Calzones, I was in the mood for dessert and Caffee Greco caught my eye with the gelato. The gelato  and the cannolis really hit the spot.
This place was decent for its gelato. They only took cash. The restroom didn't have any toilet paper.
Excellent service, great ambience, and delicious cafe latte. It's the perfect place to relax and enjoy a beautiful Sunday morning.
Their lattes are really good.Their cakes are delicious. The service is friendly. Parking is a bit tough.
Panini sandwiches were OK, a bit greasy. Side salad was wilted and past its prime. Cash only (which is odd given the prices there).
Ice cream was amazing ordered spimoni ice cream and large white chocolate cafe mocha. Everything was delicious and service was quick.
Always one of my favorite places to go in San Francisco.  The service,  the coffee, and the pastries are all perfect!
North Beach cafe. Wonderful coffee and pastries. Sidewalk tables. Charming San Francisco. Little Italy at best!
The coffee was amazing and the guy serving us was really friendly
Nice place to relax, enjoy a hot coffee  served in a variety of ways along with a great assortment of sweet treats.
good coffee, nice sidewalk tables, cash only
we visit this cafe often especially on the weekend. we love the cake and enjoy the coffee. it is a relaxing watching people,
The desserts and coffee where great, the people working there where super nice
Food was nice and the atmosphere was great.    Enjoyed the Greco Sunrise soda.  Cash only, no credit cards.
Best cafe experience at North Beach. The parklets decreased the ambiance but still good
We had breakfast outside on the little sidewalk patio, our food and lattes were delicious, nice to sit and enjoy the busy surroundings
Inviting and a lot of offerings. Seems popular with the local crowd. However they only take cash. Don't be caught off guard.
If you've been to Europe and miss that style of cafe... This helps :)  The crowd can get nuts on the weekend
Great Italian cappuccino! Good meals
I've been going to this place since '90s, everything is great, with exception of coffee/espresso drinks tasting better in the old days...
It’s the best breakfast/ brunch caffe in SF!!
Proper coffee and patisserie. Great people. You lose one star because you only take cash. Come on guys, it's 2020.
Nice place to sit outside and enjoy an afternoon glass of bubbly wine.
Good enough, but very expensive. Machiotto 3.50, just ok espesso. Cannoli was good but around 5 bucks.
$3 for an 8 oz glass of hot water with a basic twinings tea packet. Worse is they then want $1 for an extra 8oz of hot water.
Good vibe Average coffee Low service
Cute cafe with amazing coffee, friendly staff, and a perfect outside patio
I only get a chance to visit San Francisco every couple years or so and I always make sure to drop in here.  I love the latte.
Good coffee, nice breakfast. Pleasant view from the window, or when you sit outside. Definitely a cozy place!
Good espresso and great cannoli! Don’t forget your cash!
Get there early to get the hot scones!  Great coffee too.
Barista was careless. my espresso was clearlly over extracted. He also did not level the coffee before tamping it which makes coffee was not level inside.
Expensive and mediocre. 17 bucks for 2 coffees. The people that work there are nice, but that doesn't justify the price.
Best coffee place in little Italy!!! You must try the cheese cake and cookies! The only downside is that is cash only!
Beautiful place for a cappuccino and biscotti at an outdoor table.  Mix of locals and tourists.  Cash only.
Incredible tiramisu!
White mocha was absolutely incredible, and the gelato as well! Stumbled upon this place, but so glad we did.
The organization and designation for the ordering line could be better. My cappuccino came to me lukewarm. Good people watching.
Coffee was good. Cheese cake alright. Cash only! Really!
Always great and fresh food.  Fantastic lox and bagel, great Greco grande cappuccino.
Very welcoming, great coffee and pastries! When in San Francisco you will find this great place.
Only had a coffee,  unfortunately it is a self service place.
A couple of friends and I were lost in the city, then we met a Local Guide who introduced us to this place. Worth the visit as at the end of the night, we forgot we were lost in the first place.
I love this place and its peculiar atmosphere. Great option for a good coffee and people watching.
Nice coffee place, great espresso and selection of tasty cheesecakes.
Great food. Great service. Gluten free options. Good place to bring your kids.
Nice Illy Espresso & cappuccino, and the sweet of Cannoli is just appropriate! Really enjoy it!
If you want a real italian expresso in San Francisco, this is the place. I suggest also the Tiramisu, it's done with original italian recipe
Best cafe in Sf
One of the best coffees and deserts in SF
Good food and coffee with nice price, lazy worry free atmosphere, friendly smiling clerks.
New restaurant with minimalist decor, staff that hustles, good food. Hope it fills it's tables
Awesome coffee, delicious cannoli, great staff and relaxing atmosphere.
Great cappuccino and tiramisu! Barmen are super fun and friendly even more if you speak Spanish😜 …
Nice paninis and drinks here. Enjoyed my stay while I sat and journaled. Bring cash only
Great food, would've been 5 stars if they accepted credit cards.
great hot chocolate  and cake cool relato  many flavors
Macchiato was delicious. Lovely Cafe. Want to try the cheesecake next time.
Great people great coffee!
Cornetto not good. Really expensive
Delicious coffee, nice seating outside and very friendly staff. The prices are very fair
Service was slow and out door seated area was nice until some homeless person we don't know became agitated at the people seated there.
Love espresso here. Tiramisu is OMG
Nice place. We sat outside to watch the Italian Heritage Parade.
Lots of great coffees, Italian sodas, desserts  and sandwiches. Outdoor seating is a plus!
Best coffee in SF. I highly recommend a double macchiato enjoyed with a cigarette at a table outside.
great food, coffee drinks and service!  and open till 11pm on weekends!
Great place, European atmosphere. Lived it
Probably the best place for Italian desserts in SF! Their tramisu is to die for.
Great coffee, great cafe, great staff and the cakes and pastries aren't to shabby either.
Best egg scrambler and chai tea latte I've had in a long time❤❤❤
Delicious food excellent service. Will definitely dine again when in town.
Lovely breakfast here!
Delicious food, coffee and desserts are unbelievable good, great customer service.
Great service. Well made Greek coffee. Sidewalk tables are a great
Cash only.  Popped in for dessert once -- pretty large selection, quick service, great taste for the price.
Service was great,my cake was moist and not too sweet, restrooms were disgusting though
Best place in town yo hang out with friends and family  for desserts and cpfee.😎 …
Smoked Salmon bagel was tasty as was the freshly squeezed orange juice but I was surprised at how expensive the total bill came to
Awesome drink's and Italian pastries, great service latino team. Thanks all of you guys.
Nice view of the street but the food is nothing special, not greek at all. Cash only.
Great sandwich, cappuccino atmosphere and music! And nice staff.
Belgium waffle with strawberries, bananas, and fresh whipped cream.. fresh squeezed orange juice... just amazing!
Favorite spot in SF, don't pass up espresso w/ Cannoli or Tiramisu
Great cafe to do work or meet with friends. Great atmosphere. Great coffee.
One of the best traditional coffees in North Beach. Never disappoints.
Great coffee, canolis are tasty too. Fair price. Hablan español.
My favorite coffee place in San Francisco. I love to sit outside and relax watching people walk by
Wonderful airy atmosphere in an interesting location, great espresso, sweets, etc.
My favorite coffee house in North Beach! Carlos is the best barista ever!
Get there early if you want some fresh whipped cream on your hot cocoa.
best coffee I ever had!! Thick foams, classic Italian style
Desserts are great! Nice ambiance. Authentic Italian.
The afogato was very nice and the cappucino was ok  Great servce though
Interior is outdated. Cash only. Coffee is so - so. Place has a history but not the nicest.
Tiramisu and double African coffee. Yummmm
Good coffee, ice cream. Very friendly staffs
Excellent espresso and cappuccino and food. Service was great too.
Great coffee and sweets, and above all great service with a big smile.
Perfect european style caffe. A lot of differents caffes and chocolates, and they are bigsize! Great people too.
The best cheese cake and Coffee in San francisco. Love them to bits.
Cash only. The coffee is just great. Very cool touristy place
Lovely place ☕️
Nice atmosphere and very friendly service, will visit more often.
Ice cream so yummy!
Didn’t like the coffee here, ordered a soy latte.
Good coffee and pastries/desserts. Comfortable indoor and outdoor seating.
Great place to have a cup of coffee and relax, read a book or watch people
Italian coffee and great Turron. Good place to have breakfast.
Coffee was great, good place to people watch
Nice place, good outside seating, good food! But, cash only!
Super friendly and the tiramisu was fantastic.
Awesome coffee and awesome food! Outdoor sitting area is nice.
Not good attention, you have to wait for too long and meanwhile you can't use the restrooms. Food is nothing great
Good place for espresso drinks and gelato. Some outdoors seats as well.
The BEST espresso (illy) and cannolis in SF. Sit out front and people watch.
Good coffee. Nice outdoor seating. Friendly staff
Fabulous
Pricey for breakfast but it is San Francisco.
Great coffee and panini! The staff is so friendly
11 usd
Best cappuccino in sf for the 30 years I've been drinking them.
Good spot for coffee. The downside is that they take only cash.
Tiramisu was excellent. But my favorite was the Braziliana!!
Always come to this place for coffee when I am in SF.
i once had to poop here it was awesome!!!!
Best Italian coffee in town! This is not the regular p** of Starbucks coffee, this is real Italian coffee culture!
Nice coffe at little italy
The only caffe place u can smoke a cigarette with a good coffee
Great service, delicious and authentic espresso drinks!

If you've been to Europe enough to get tired of it, you don't have to go there. But if you want to have a great morning in San Francisco, I definitely recommend going. The coffee here makes you feel like you used to have coffee in Paris, France or Italy. Dine at a seat on the terrace overlooking the road  I ate here twice on my weeklong itinerary.  The famous menu is a sandwich with mozzarella cheese and tomatoes, and the croissant topped with scrambled eggs is also highly recommended!
Cafeteria in the Italian neighborhood with very good service and varied breakfast options. It has tables inside and a terrace. The payment is in cash
